displayProperties.name: Electrified Conductor
displayProperties.description:
This mod's perks are only active in the "Salvation's Edge" raid.

Multiple copies of this mod stack and improve its effects.

1886465.itemTypeDisplayName:
This mod's perks are only active in the "Salvation's Edge" raid.

Multiple copies of this mod stack and improve its effects.

displayProperties.name: Incandescence: Helmet
displayProperties.description: Stoke the bonfire within the Bonfire Bash activity to imbue your armor with a glow.

displayProperties.name: Solstice Package
displayProperties.description: A small, neatly wrapped gift box to celebrate Solstice.

displayProperties.name: The Right Choice
displayProperties.description: Every seventh bullet from this weapon ricochets to nearby targets.

displayProperties.name: Premium Research Bay
displayProperties.description: An empty research bay where Failsafe can store specimens.

displayProperties.name: Assimilated Torch Hammer
displayProperties.description: NES006: A Minotaur's weapon lost to the trials of combat.

displayProperties.name: A Glowing Solstice
displayProperties.description:
Gather enough Alloys to purchase an Incandescence quest for any Solstice armor piece.

Earning enough of any of the Solstice Forge Alloys will complete this quest step.

displayProperties.name: Lambent Luster Cloak
displayProperties.description: Equip this ornament on any eligible Legendary armor item to change its appearance. Once you get a universal ornament, it's unlocked for all characters of the relevant class on your account.

displayProperties.name: A Glowing Solstice
displayProperties.description:
Use the Ingot you have just forged to acquire a piece of Sublime armor!

You can acquire your armor from the Solstice Forge armor piece category that matches your Ingot quest.

displayProperties.description: Equip this ornament on any eligible Legendary armor item to change its appearance. Once you get a universal ornament, it's unlocked for all characters of the relevant class on your account.

displayProperties.description: Equip this ornament on any eligible Legendary armor item to change its appearance. Once you get a universal ornament, it's unlocked for all characters of the relevant class on your account.

displayProperties.description: Complete the Bonfire Bash activity to transform your Ingot into a piece of armor.

displayProperties.description: Equip this ornament on any eligible Legendary armor item to change its appearance. Once you get a universal ornament, it's unlocked for all characters of the relevant class on your account.

displayProperties.name: Exotic Engram
displayProperties.description:
An engram with a predestined outcome.

Contains a new Exotic if any of the possible rewards remain to be collected.

displayProperties.name: A Glowing Solstice
displayProperties.description: Acquire any Incandescence quest from the Solstice Forge.

displayProperties.name: Incandescence: Class Item
displayProperties.description: Stoke the bonfire within the Bonfire Bash activity to imbue your armor with a glow.

displayProperties.name: Captain Jacobson
displayProperties.description: NES005: A frog that appears to be very friendly. And very deadly.

displayProperties.name: A Glowing Solstice
displayProperties.description:
Collect Alloys of any armor piece category in order to purchase an Ingot quest from the Solstice Forge.

Earning enough of any type of Alloy will complete this quest step.

displayProperties.name: Forging an Ingot: Class Item
displayProperties.description: Complete the Bonfire Bash activity to transform your Ingot into a piece of armor.

displayProperties.name: Specimen ID: NES006
displayProperties.description:
This specimen is a Vex weapon of some kind. However, it is as yet impossible to pinpoint what kind of Vex wielded it.

Defeat combatants with Sidearms or Auto Rifles to narrow down the weapon's projectile type. Defeating other Guardians grants bonus progress.

displayProperties.name: Forging an Ingot: Leg Armor
displayProperties.description: Receive your new armor from the Solstice Forge.

displayProperties.name: Specimen ID: NES006
displayProperties.description:
The weapon is calibrated to do medium amounts of damage. The next step to narrowing down its source is identifying its damage type.

Defeat combatants with Arc or Solar damage to provide a signature reading. Defeating other Guardians grants bonus progress.

displayProperties.name: Specimen ID: NES006
displayProperties.description:
The specimen appears to deal Arc damage through a modified power source.

Generate Orbs of Power to generate some potential comparison data for Failsafe to study. Orbs generated in Crucible or Gambit generate bonus progress.

displayProperties.name: A Glowing Solstice
displayProperties.description: Advance the Incandescence quest acquired from the Solstice Forge.

displayProperties.name: Specimen ID: NES006
displayProperties.description: Speak with Failsafe in the H.E.L.M. to review her final specimen analysis report.

displayProperties.name: Specimen ID: NES006
displayProperties.description: Travel to the H.E.L.M. and place the Assimilated Torch Hammer in your specimen collection.

displayProperties.name: Radiolite Learning-Analysis
displayProperties.description:
Improves rewards from the Radiolite Bay:
• Glimmer
• XP
• Failsafe Reputation
• Enhancement Core (chance to earn up to 3)
• Enhancement Prism (rare)

-Inserted comment: Getting better every day, Captain!

displayProperties.name: Piston Hammer Efficiency
displayProperties.description:
Using the Piston Hammer will occasionally recharge it, instead of consuming a hammer charge.

Inserted comment: Make sure all toes and fireteam members are clear of swing radius before operating!

displayProperties.name: Secondary Engram Focusing
displayProperties.description:
Unlocks focusing of Echo Engrams into the following Echo gear once added to your collection:
Weapons:
• Aberrant Action
• Corrasion

Inserted comment: Greetings, Captain! There should no longer be ANY chance of engram deletion!

displayProperties.name: Specimen ID: NES005
displayProperties.description: Give Captain Jacobson a new home in the H.E.L.M.

displayProperties.name: Specimen ID: NES005
displayProperties.description: Speak with Failsafe in the H.E.L.M. to review her final specimen analysis report.

displayProperties.name: Specimen ID: NES005
displayProperties.description:
The H.E.L.M. doesn't have room for more than one specimen. That doesn't mean its species should go unprotected.

Defeat Vex on Nessus to ensure a safe habitat.

displayProperties.name: Specimen ID: NES005
displayProperties.description:
To keep this specimen happy, healthy, and enriched, it will need a natural habitat.

Collect flora from Nessus to prepare a small terrarium in the H.E.L.M.

displayProperties.name: Specimen ID: NES005
displayProperties.description:
Failsafe is concerned that this specimen looks hungry and has run an analysis of its dietary needs.

Collect Iridescent Radiolite to find nutritional clusters within. Failsafe calls these clusters "Bufo Bites," and believes they mirror the animal's natural food source.

displayProperties.name: Proximity Sensor Alert
displayProperties.description: A viable research specimen has been detected. Failsafe will guide you to it with her proximity sensors.

displayProperties.name: Data Format Cipher
displayProperties.description:
Unlocks additional engrams when opening Echo Chests.

- Inserted comment: The same way the Vex used this tech to deformat matter, I'll use it to reformat engram data in the field.

displayProperties.name: Combat Protocol Override
displayProperties.description:
Detects the presence of high-value targets in Echoes Battlegrounds. Defeat the high-value targets for bonus rewards.

- Inserted comment: Protocol overrides broadcasting, Captain. Mind the lasers!

displayProperties.name: Premium Research Bay
displayProperties.description: An empty research bay where Failsafe can store specimens.

displayProperties.name: Specimen ID: NES006
displayProperties.description: A research specimen found on Nessus. Complete the research quest to provide Failsafe with enough data to identify it.

displayProperties.name: Specimen Research Report
displayProperties.description: Failsafe has compiled a specimen research report for you.
Defeat combatants with Shotguns in the Bonfire Bash.

displayProperties.description: Decrypt this engram to receive gear and weapons from the Season of Defiance.
displayProperties.name: Defiant Engram

displayProperties.description:
Imbue this armor with this Spark to reroll its stats with high Discipline.

Silver Ash can be earned from transforming Silver Leaves in the Bonfire Bash.
displayProperties.name: Spark of Discipline

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Imbuing armor with a Spark guarantees a minimum of +20 in its corresponding stat.
Armorer Ghost mods guarantee a minimum of +10 in their corresponding stats.

insertionRules.failureMessage: Requires armor to be fully rekindled
Cannot imbue this Spark while an Armorer Ghost mod for its stat is currently equipped.

displayProperties.description: Collect Kindling by completing Event Challenges that award them.
displayProperties.name: Rekindle the Spark

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

183342384.displaySource: "Gathering firewood can take time and effort, but the flames bring warmth to us all." —Eva Levante

setData.questLineDescription: Fully upgrade your Sunlit Armor and imbue it with a Spark.
setData.questStepSummary: Collect Kindling by completing certain Event Challenges. These can be viewed and completed within the Solstice Event Card.

displayProperties.description:
Open the Armor Details screen and add the maximum amount of Kindling to any piece of Sunlit armor. You can add Kindling under armor mods.

Fully rekindling a piece of Sunlit armor unlocks its glow, and allows you to imbue it with a Spark.
displayProperties.name: Rekindle the Spark

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

183342385.displaySource: "Every fire needs some kindling for the spark." —Eva Levante

setData.questLineDescription: Fully upgrade your Sunlit Armor and imbue it with a Spark.
setData.questStepSummary: Sunlit armor with the maximum amount of Kindling added can be imbued with Sparks, which boost specific stats.

displayProperties.description: Collect Silver Leaves by completing activities during Solstice with your Sunlit armor equipped.
displayProperties.name: Rekindle the Spark

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

183342386.displaySource: "I don't know why these leaves have suddenly appeared, but I take it as a sign that it is time to turn our thoughts to renewal." —Eva Levante

setData.questLineDescription: Fully upgrade your Sunlit Armor and imbue it with a Spark.
setData.questStepSummary: Don your Sunlit armor and complete activities across the solar system to collect Silver Leaves, which can be converted to Silver Ash by completing the Bonfire Bash.

displayProperties.description: Transform your Silver Leaves into Silver Ash by completing the Bonfire Bash.
displayProperties.name: Rekindle the Spark

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

183342387.displaySource: "From the ashes of the past rises a bright new future." —Eva Levante

setData.questLineDescription: Fully upgrade your Sunlit Armor and imbue it with a Spark.
setData.questStepSummary: Don your Sunlit armor and stoke the flames in the Bonfire Bash. Throw your Silver Leaves on the roaring fire to transform them into Silver Ash.

displayProperties.description: Visit Eva Levante in the Tower.
displayProperties.name: Rekindle the Spark

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

183342390.displaySource: "You've rekindled your armor, Guardian! Look at it glow!" —Eva Levante

setData.questLineDescription: Fully upgrade your Sunlit Armor and imbue it with a Spark.
setData.questStepSummary:
Additional pieces of Sunlit armor can be fully rekindled and equipped with Sparks to boost the stats of your choosing.

Earn and upgrade more Sunlit armor to build focused armor sets!

displayProperties.description: Earned from transforming Silver Leaves by stoking the bonfire in the Bonfire Bash. Used to imbue Solstice armor with Embers.
displayProperties.name: Silver Ash

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

displayProperties.description:
Automatically redeemed when opening a Deep Chest, improving the rewards.

Up to two Deep Chests can be found at the end of Deep Dives.
displayProperties.name: Deep Dive Key

displayProperties.description:
Imbue this armor with this Spark to reroll its stats with high Recovery.

Silver Ash can be earned from transforming Silver Leaves in the Bonfire Bash.
displayProperties.name: Spark of Recovery

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Imbuing armor with a Spark guarantees a minimum of +20 in its corresponding stat.

Cannot imbue this Spark while an Armorer Ghost mod for its stat is currently equipped.

displayProperties.description:
Add Kindling to this armor in order to imbue it with Sparks and unlock its glow. 

Kindling is acquired from completing Event Challenges.
displayProperties.name: Fully Rekindled

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
All Sunlit armor of the same slot will be fully rekindled.

Rekindling Sunlit armor unlocks its glow.

insertionRules.failureMessage: Requires Large Kindling

displayProperties.description: Visit Eva Levante in the Tower.
displayProperties.name: Celebrating Solstice

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

setData.questLineDescription: Celebrate Solstice with Eva Levante.
setData.questStepSummary:
Speak to Eva again while wearing your Sunlit armor. 

It may be at the Postmaster if your armor inventory was full when Eva gave it to you.

displayProperties.description:
An heirloom from the Season of the Deep. Used to collect Salvage Keys, Deep Dive Keys, and Deep Engrams by completing strikes, Crucible, Gambit, or other activities.

This item can be safely discarded at any time to stop earning Season of the Deep rewards. Visit the Sonar Station in the H.E.L.M. to recover it.

displayProperties.name: No Kindling Added

displayProperties.description: Visit Eva Levante in the Tower.
displayProperties.name: A Guardian in Shining Armor

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

1021261779.displaySource: "Your armor is even more resplendent than before!" —Eva Levante

setData.questLineDescription: Improve your Sunlit armor by imbuing it with Shining Embers.
setData.questStepSummary: You can feel your Sunlit armor brimming with heat. With enough Kindling and Silver Ash, even more of its dormant power can be reawakened.

displayProperties.description:
Open the Details screen on a piece of Sunlit armor with Small Kindling added as a mod. Add the Large Kindling under armor mods.

Adding Large Kindling allows Sunlit armor to be imbued with Shining Embers. You may only imbue an armor piece with Large Kindling applied as a mod.
displayProperties.name: A Guardian in Shining Armor

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

1021261780.displaySource: "The more kindling, the larger the fire." —Eva Levante

setData.questLineDescription: Improve your Sunlit armor by imbuing it with Shining Embers.
setData.questStepSummary: Sunlit armor with Large Kindling added can be imbued with Shining Embers, which has a chance of rolling a high random stat.

displayProperties.description: Collect Kindling by completing Event Challenges that award them.
displayProperties.name: A Guardian in Shining Armor

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

1021261781.displaySource: "Fires can be frightening, but also wonderful. They bring people together." —Eva Levante

setData.questLineDescription: Improve your Sunlit armor by imbuing it with Shining Embers.
setData.questStepSummary: Collect Kindling by completing certain Event Challenges. These can be viewed and completed within the Solstice Event Card.

displayProperties.description: Transform your Silver Leaves into Silver Ash by completing the Bonfire Bash.
displayProperties.name: A Guardian in Shining Armor

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

setData.questLineDescription: Improve your Sunlit armor by imbuing it with Shining Embers.
setData.questStepSummary: Don your Sunlit armor and stoke the flames in the Bonfire Bash. Throw your Silver Leaves on the roaring fire to transform them into Silver Ash.

displayProperties.description: Collect Silver Leaves by completing activities during Solstice with your Sunlit armor equipped.
displayProperties.name: A Guardian in Shining Armor

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

setData.questLineDescription: Improve your Sunlit armor by imbuing it with Shining Embers.
setData.questStepSummary: Don your Sunlit armor and complete activities across the solar system to collect Silver Leaves, which can be converted to Silver Ash by completing the Bonfire Bash.

displayProperties.description: Visit Eva Levante in the Tower.
displayProperties.name: A Glowing Solstice

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

setData.questLineDescription: Fully rekindle an entire set of Sunlit armor.

displayProperties.description:
Imbue this armor with this Spark to reroll its stats with high Recovery.

Silver Ash can be earned from transforming Silver Leaves in the Bonfire Bash.
displayProperties.name: Spark of Recovery

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Imbuing armor with a Spark guarantees a minimum of +20 in its corresponding stat.
Armorer Ghost mods guarantee a minimum of +10 in their corresponding stats.

insertionRules.failureMessage: Requires armor to be fully rekindled
Cannot imbue this Spark while an Armorer Ghost mod for its stat is currently equipped.

displayProperties.description:
Automatically consumed when opening Season of Defiance Battlegrounds chests to unlock bonus rewards.

Defiant Keys are found by completing activities throughout the system.
displayProperties.name: Defiant Key

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Reactivate Defiant Key and Defiant Engram rewards at the War Table.

displayProperties.description:
Opening Salvage Chests and Deep Dive Chests grants bonus reputation.

Bonus reputation is increased for each fireteam member with this upgrade.
displayProperties.name: Synchronized Swimming

displayProperties.description:
Each encounter during Deep Dive contains a hidden chest containing Heavy and Special ammo.

Opening the chest grants additional objective time.
displayProperties.name: Dive Station

displayProperties.description:
Automatically redeemed when opening a Salvage Chest, improving the rewards.

Salvage Chests can be found at the end of Salvage activities.
displayProperties.name: Salvage Key

displayProperties.description:
Automatically redeemed when opening a Deep Chest, improving the rewards.

Up to two Deep Chests can be found at the end of Deep Dives.
displayProperties.name: Deep Dive Key

displayProperties.description:
An heirloom from the Season of the Witch. Used to collect Witch's Keys and Witch's Engrams by completing strikes, Crucible, Gambit, or other activities.

This item can be safely discarded at any time to stop earning Season of the Witch rewards. Visit the Ritual Table in the H.E.L.M. to recover it.
displayProperties.name: Legacy: Acolyte's Staff

displayProperties.description: Earned from completing and claiming Event Challenges.
displayProperties.name: Kindling

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

displayProperties.description: Used to upgrade the Sonar Station in the H.E.L.M.
displayProperties.name: Sonar Station Vendor Upgrade

displayProperties.description: Fully rekindle Sunlit armor by applying the maximum amount of Kindling to unlock their glows.
displayProperties.name: Sunlit Armor Glow

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Glows for all armor pieces have not yet been unlocked.

displayProperties.description:
Open the Details screen on any piece of Sunlit armor, and add the Kindling under armor mods. 

Doing so will allow you to spend Silver Ash to imbue the armor with Embers that improve it.
displayProperties.name: Celebrating Solstice

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

1538897096.displaySource: "With some Kindling and some Silver Ash, who knows what you could reignite?" —Eva Levante

setData.questLineDescription: Celebrate Solstice with Eva Levante.
setData.questStepSummary: You can feel the heat emanating from your Sunlit armor. If you were to add Kindling to it, it would certainly have an effect.

displayProperties.description: Open your Event Card and claim your first Event Challenge.
displayProperties.name: Celebrating Solstice

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

1538897097.displaySource: "So many different ways to celebrate!" —Eva Levante

setData.questLineDescription: Celebrate Solstice with Eva Levante.
setData.questStepSummary:
Your Solstice Event Card contains Event Challenges that grant various rewards upon completion. 

Kindling awarded from completing Event Challenges can be used to improve your Sunlit armor.

displayProperties.description: Visit Eva Levante in the Tower.
displayProperties.name: Celebrating Solstice

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

setData.questLineDescription: Celebrate Solstice with Eva Levante.
setData.questStepSummary: Eva will certainly want to see your newly improved armor. Her eyes are sure to be full of joy and pride at the sight of you.

displayProperties.description: Equip a full set of Sunlit armor.
displayProperties.name: Celebrating Solstice

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

1538897100.displaySource: "What would Solstice be without a shiny new set of armor?" —Eva Levante

setData.questLineDescription: Celebrate Solstice with Eva Levante.
setData.questStepSummary: The Sunlit armor thrums with hidden power. You can tell that, like the armor of past Solstice celebrations, its true potential has yet to be discovered.

displayProperties.description: Visit Eva Levante in the Tower.
displayProperties.name: Celebrating Solstice

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

1538897102.displaySource: "I believe in you, Guardians! And my faith has always been rewarded." —Saint-14

setData.questLineDescription: Celebrate Solstice with Eva Levante.
setData.questStepSummary: The ashes from the bonfire shimmer with paracausal power. Perhaps Eva will be interested in seeing them.

displayProperties.description: Complete the Bonfire Bash activity to transform your Silver Leaves into Silver Ash.
displayProperties.name: Celebrating Solstice

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

1538897103.displaySource: "The European Aerial Zone never ceases to amaze me." —Eva Levante

setData.questLineDescription: Celebrate Solstice with Eva Levante.
setData.questStepSummary:
With your Sunlit armor equipped, complete the Bonfire Bash activity in the European Aerial Zone.

Inspect the bonfire at the end of the activity to transform your Silver Leaves into Silver Ash. The more you stoke the flames, the more Silver Leaves are transformed.

displayProperties.description:
Imbue this armor with Shining Embers to reroll its stats, with a chance of rolling a high stat at random.

Silver Ash can be earned from transforming Silver Leaves in the Bonfire Bash.
displayProperties.name: Shining Embers

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Imbuing armor with Embers increases its stats most of the time, but there is a small chance that its stat total will decrease.
Armorer Ghost mods affect rerolled stats.

displayProperties.description: Earned from completing activities while wearing Solstice armor.

Imbue a piece of Sunlit armor with Shining Embers. You can do so from the armor mods of the Sunlit armor.

displayProperties.name: A Guardian in Shining Armor

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

setData.questLineDescription: Improve your Sunlit armor by imbuing it with Shining Embers.
setData.questStepSummary:
Shining Embers reroll an armor's stats with a chance of rolling a high stat at random.

Imbuing armor with Shining Embers requires an expenditure of Silver Ash and cannot be undone.

displayProperties.description:
Add the maximum amount of Kindling to a piece of Sunlit armor from the Armor Details screen.

Doing so will fully rekindle the armor, unlock the armor's glow, and allow you to imbue it with a Spark.
displayProperties.name: A Glowing Solstice

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Expires at the end of Solstice

1747968352.displaySource: "Just like a bonfire, your armor will need a lot of kindling." —Eva Levante

displayProperties.description: Upgrade this Ghost to increase its energy capacity by 1. Fully upgrading this Ghost to Masterwork provides an additional mod socket.

displayProperties.name: Activity Mod Socket
displayProperties.description: Activity mods provide additional currency and material rewards in various activities.

displayProperties.name: Tracking Mod Socket
displayProperties.description: Tracking mods increase the range of the detection of caches and resources out in the field.

displayProperties.name: Economic Mod Socket
displayProperties.description: Economic mods increase currency and resource gains from sources.

displayProperties.name: No Projection
displayProperties.description: Restores your Ghost to an empty projection.

displayProperties.name: Activity Mod Socket
displayProperties.description: Available once the Ghost shell has been fully Masterworked.

displayProperties.name: Experience Mod Socket
displayProperties.description: Experience mods increase global experience gains.

displayProperties.name: Default Shader
displayProperties.description: Restores your gear to its default colors.
